arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne distances himself from San Diego FC: "Those salaries don't fit our budget"
arts.sum: Tyler Heaps, sporting director of San Diego FC, spoke to The Sun about the rumors that already placed KDB in the MLS expansion team and his response will break the heart of more than one. After several months of rumors of advanced negotiations with the player, the Southern California club has denied all this and it seems that this signing will only remain a fantasy in a video game career mode

arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne transfer talks confirmed as Man City exit looms - "I've had conversations"
arts.sum: Kevin De Bruyne's contract with Manchester City expires in June and his future remains undecided, although the expectation is that he'll quit the Premier League champions

arts.ttl: Mudryk handed Chelsea ESCAPE ROUTE amid Man Utd interest
arts.sum: Sevilla are reportedly interested in completing a shock deal for Chelsea outcast Mykhailo Mudryk during the 2025 summer transfer window. The Spanish giants are reportedly eager to copy the strategy used by inter-city rivals Real Betis - who signed Man Utd flop Antony on a six-month loan deal in January and have already benefited from the Brazilian’s arrival .

arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne transfer talks confirmed as Man City star suffers £400,000 setback
arts.sum: Manchester City midfielder Kevin De Bruyne has held talks with MLS outfit San Diego FC ahead of the expiry of his Citizens contract at the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Mykhailo Mudryk handed surprise transfer lifeline
arts.sum: Mykhailo Mudryk could be offered the chance to leave Chelsea in the summer if he is cleared of his doping charges.

arts.ttl: MLS club reveal shock talks with Kevin De Bruyne - with the Man City legend set to leave on a free when his contract expires
arts.sum: De Bruyne missed much of last season through injury, and looked destined to depart the club in the summer to join Karim Benzema at Saudi Pro League club Al-Ittihad.

arts.ttl: Chelsea in DREAMLAND as €50m Mudryk offer prepared
arts.sum: However, Bayer Leverkusen have also been linked with signing Mudryk in recent weeks, suggesting Man Utd may face shock competition for his signature if they seriously decide to pursue a deal this summer. The 24-year-old is seen as the perfect candidate to slot into Amorim’s 3-4-3 system and with Marcus Rashford, Antony and Alejandro Garnacho potentially set to depart Old Trafford this year, the Red Devils are eyeing a possible deal for Mudryk, despite his struggles at Chelsea.
